Texto: 
1. severe dilatation of fourth ventricle (large cyst)
2. no dilatation of lateral/third ventricles (not shunt failure)
3. ventricular shunt and chronic distortion of left > right cerebral hemispheres are new compared with head ultrasound from years ago (no other studies available)
trapped or encysted fourth ventricle = chronic sequela from old intraventricular hemorrhage
